section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"American aircraft" means an aircraft registered under the laws of the United States.

"Vessel" means:
a vessel that is documented or numbered under the laws of the United States; or
a vessel that is not documented or numbered under the laws of the United States and is not documented under the laws of any foreign country whose crew performs service solely for:
a citizen or resident of the United States; or
a corporation organized under the laws of a state.

text.section:
Employment that otherwise meets the requirements of § 8-201 of this subtitle is covered employment if the employment is:
performed in the State, including:
employment performed on land that the United States government holds or owns; and
employment performed in interstate commerce; or
deemed to be performed in the State under an election made by an employer and approved by the Secretary under a reciprocal arrangement between the Secretary and a unit of another state or the federal government in accordance with Subtitle 7 of this title.

Employment that otherwise meets the requirements of § 8-201 of this subtitle and is performed partly in this State is covered employment in its entirety if:
the employment that is performed outside this State is incidental to the employment that is performed in this State, including employment that is temporary or transitory or that consists of isolated transactions;
the employment that is performed in this State is not incidental to employment that is performed in any particular state but:
the base of operations is in this State; or
the place from which the employment is controlled or directed is in this State; or
the employment:
is performed by an individual who is a resident of this State; and
is not performed in part in a state in which the employment is controlled or directed or in which the base of operations is located.
